Uses of Class
org.la4j.matrix.dense.Basic2DMatrix

  • Packages that use Basic2DMatrix 
    Package Description
    org.la4j  
    org.la4j.matrix.dense  

    • Uses of Basic2DMatrix in org.la4j

      Fields in org.la4j with type parameters of type Basic2DMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MatrixFactory<Basic2DMatrix> Matrices.BASIC_2D
      A matrix factory that produces zero Basic2DMatrix.
      static MatrixFactory<Basic2DMatrix> Matrices.DENSE
      A default matrix factory for dense matrices.

    • Uses of Basic2DMatrix in org.la4j.matrix.dense

      Methods in org.la4j.matrix.dense that return Basic2DMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.block(Matrix a, Matrix b, Matrix c, Matrix d)
      Creates a block Basic2DMatrix of the given blocks a, b, c and d.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.constant(int rows, int columns, double constant)
      Creates a constant Basic2DMatrix of the given shape and value.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.diagonal(int size, double diagonal)
      Creates a diagonal Basic2DMatrix of the given size whose diagonal elements are equal to diagonal.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.from1DArray(int rows, int columns, double[] array)
      Creates a Basic2DMatrix of the given 1D array with copying the underlying array.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.from2DArray(double[][] array)
      Creates a Basic2DMatrix of the given 2D array w/o copying the underlying array.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.fromBinary(byte[] array)
      Decodes Basic2DMatrix from the given byte array.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.fromCSV(String csv)
      Parses Basic2DMatrix from the given CSV string.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.fromMatrixMarket(String mm)
      Parses Basic2DMatrix from the given Matrix Market string.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.identity(int size)
      Creates an identity Basic2DMatrix of the given size.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.random(int rows, int columns, Random random)
      Creates a random Basic2DMatrix of the given shape: rows x columns.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.randomSymmetric(int size, Random random)
      Creates a random symmetric Basic2DMatrix of the given size.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.unit(int rows, int columns)
      Creates an unit Basic2DMatrix of the given shape: rows x columns.
      static Basic2DMatrix Basic2DMatrix.zero(int rows, int columns)
      Creates a zero Basic2DMatrix of the given shape: rows x columns.
